fails:Enumerator#each_slice iterates the block for each slice of n elements
fails:Enumerator#each_slice iterates over last tail slice
fails:Enumerator#each_slice stops iteration on exception
fails:Enumerator#each_slice walks Enumerable elements strictly in forward direction, in parallel with iteration
fails:Enumerator#each_slice allows Enumerable to change during the iteration
fails:Enumerator#each_slice raises LocalJumpError if no block is given
fails:Enumerator#each_slice raises ArgumentError for n <= 0
fails:Enumerator#each_slice raises RangeError for Bignum parameter
